text: Hi! How are you toad?
I'm good how about you?
I am well. How is the weather by you?
Hot, and well, I think the sun is coming around
Yes, it looks like today is going to be warm here as well. What are your plans for today?
Mostly working on surveys, so how do you feel about children's charities?
I was going to ask you the same. Have you heard of Save th Children and the work they do?
Yeah, I think mostly everyone has, I think charities are mostly good but I don't know that they always accomplis all they could well, with expenses and all

Well, STC is a great one! They help a vast amount of kids. You have a chance to help today by donating even a small amount of your pay. As little as $0.05 would be of great help or how much ever you would like to donate from this bonus. Are you able to lend a helping bit?
sure, I'll donate $0.05.....
I am so glas! Thank you. Have you heard about the storms/flooding in Hawaii?
yeah, horrible huh? My uncle used to be located there but he's moved since
Yes, very bad. But the good news is that STC is already  ready to help out! Have you ever been on their website?
no, can't say I've been
I went on and looked around. They are helping so many that otherwise would be starving. Do you have kids in your family/extended family?
I don't personally I have a niece, and lots of cousins
I have kids and a few nieces and nephews, and lots of cousins too!. It would really break my heart to see them suffer. So, I never did ask, what are your plans for the day?
Mostly working on surveys
Oh, that is something for me too. So, just to confirm, I can count on you for a donation of $0.05, right?
yes, I can do that.....
